name: Pranay Agarwal
about:
I’m Computer Science undergrad pursuing my Bachelor’s degree from IIIT Bhubaneswar. I’m a full-stack web developer interested in Cloud Computing. I love to automate tasks while working on any project. Most of the code that I write is in JavaScript. 
 Besides programming, my newly found interests include cloud computing and system designing. I am a big fan of AWS and always on a lookout for challenging projects and work opportunities related to it.

experience.name: GirlScript Foundation
about: Developing an online learning platform from scratch.
Working on integration of backend APIs and other services like Razorpay(payment gateway).

experience.name: FINITO
about: A self-checkout app that lets you scan your product, pay online and go. The project consist of two parts – App and admin web panel for maintaining the inventory and other data.
Worked on the admin panel’s UI, Frontend API integration and backend.

experience.name: RADICALI
about: A WebApp to manage regulation changes easy to handle and manage.
Worked on the WebApp’s UI, Frontend API integration.

projects.name: Automatic NodeJS-MySQL server
projects.description: A script that reads MySQL database schema and create all REST dynamic APIs automatically. Also creates APIs for connected tables relations.

projects.name: Dynamic UI – Drag and Drop
projects.description: A WebApp that lets you create a personalized static webpage using drag, drop and resize of components.

projects.name: ADVAITA.IO
projects.description: A full-featured techno-cult fest website of the college including sign-up and a payment gateway that garnered 12,000+ views and 1100+ registrations.

projects.name: CODE4SHARE
projects.description: A collaborative code editor to share live code with additional features like a chat box and video calling.

projects.name: BODY DETECTION
projects.description: Captures frames from live CCTV video and each frame is encoded into a string which is used to detect the number of persons in that frame. Plots a graph of the number of persons detected versus time.

projects.name: Restaurant Finder
projects.description: A C++ application used to find restaurant in a locality using pincode. This is the part of an Academic Project in Object Oriented Programming.

projects.name: UNIVERCELL
projects.description: A dummy e-commerce website to choose, select and buy electronics. Login to your account and start shopping.
